:::{.question type=multiple_choice points=1}
What does this Rust code print?

```rust
fn main() {
    let x = 5;
    println!("x is {}", x);
}
```

- [x] x is 5
- [ ] x is x
:::

:::{.question type=multiple_choice points=1}
What is the output of this Python snippet?

```python
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("World"))
```

- [x] Hello, World!
- [ ] Hello, name!
:::
